segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some friends of mine are going to visit me this evening . Would you please buy some fruit for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . Do you need some flowers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . Can you help me to get some ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , sir . What kind of flowers would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need fruit and lilies . Am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Here is five hundred yuan in advance . Is it enough ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's quite enough . I'II have them bought for you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
